__TOC__

The DanishTeam is recognised as a legal entity in Denmark, whose main goal is to spread the word about Ubuntu and free software to the Danish people.

=== Key Details ===

* '''Date''' - (''6/3 2010'') (For use on 20-04-2010)
* '''Team Contact''' - Jesper W. Jarlskov <jesper@jarlskov.dk>
* '''Membership''' - Forum: 3871 registered users, IRC channel: ~40 users (give or take)
* '''Mailing List''' - ubuntu-dk on lists.ubuntu.com
* '''IRC''' - #ubuntu-dk on freenode
* '''Forum''' - http://www.ubuntudanmark.dk/forum/

=== Roadmap ===

Here you should provide a list of things you plan on doing. Include links to where these are discussed online and on mailing lists.

* ''Fix our webpages'' - a new Drupal based site is being worked on, a new design needs to be worked on, a forum integration for the mailing list is being contemplated.
* ''Ubuntu Live! 10.04'' - We have a more 'business' focused Live! planed for the 10.04 LTS release. It is being planed in corporation with <nowiki>[[http://osl.dk/|OSL]]</nowiki>
* ''Lucid+1 Bootcamp'' - Community event to prepare for the Lucid release cycle
* ''Ubuntu Live!'' - Keep having some events with focus on new Ubuntu releases every 6 months.
* ''Global Jam etc.'' - more involvement in Global Jams, hug days and similar global events.
* ''Non global meatups'' - arrange regular and semi regular meat ups, to work on different aspects of Ubuntu.
 
=== Experience ===

List here activities that the group has already done. Again provide links to online discussions, reviews, blog entries etc:

''Note:'' Ubuntu Live! is the name we use for our Release Parties.

* ''Global Jam'' - two days in Copenhagen. March 27+28.
* ''<nowiki>[[http://opensourcedays.org/2010/|Open Source Days 2010]]</nowiki>'' - <nowiki>[[http://gallery.vilmann.net/Kristian/OpenSourceDays/OSD2010/dsc_2800.jpg|Picture of the booth]]</nowiki>. <nowiki>[[http://compadre.dk/blog/2010/03/10/open-source-days-2010/|short (unrelated) blog post]]</nowiki>
* ''Ubuntu Live! 9.10'' - <nowiki>[[http://picasaweb.google.dk/kimsen1967/ReleaseDag910Arhus141109?authkey=Gv1sRgCOD4zraFw-62RQ#|Pictures]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://compadre.dk/blog/2009/11/15/ubuntu-live-in-arhus/|Blog post]]</nowiki>
* ''Open Source Days Community Days 2009'' - <nowiki>[[http://www.flickr.com/photos/32919408@N00/4047032658/|Picture]]</nowiki>
* ''Global Jam'' - Small and late Global Jam in Copenhagen. <nowiki>[[http://compadre.dk/blog/2009/10/11/late-global-jam-in-copenhagen/|Blog post]]</nowiki>.
* ''<nowiki>[[http://ubuntudanmark.dk/ucd/|UCD]]</nowiki>'' - Ubuntu Community Dag, a semi-monthly gathering of Ubuntu enthusiasts in Århus.
* ''<nowiki>[[http://ubuntudanmark.dk/podcast/|Ubuntu-dk Podcast]]</nowiki>'' - First episode released September 2009. Episode number 4 is in editing. Additionally 3 specials from various events have been released.
* ''Ubuntu Live! 9.04'' - Aalborg <nowiki>[[http://compadre.dk/blog/2009/04/26/ubuntu-live-in-aalborg/|blog post]]</nowiki>

* ''<nowiki>[[http://opensourcedays.org/2008/|Open Source Days]]</nowiki> 2008'' - <nowiki>[[http://compadre.dk/blog/2009/02/09/pictures-from-open-source-days-2008/|blogpost]]</nowiki>
